duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide world-class customer service and product education in retail stores.
Engage with guests, assess their needs, and provide effective purchase and return solutions.
Conduct accurate and timely guest transactions and execute omnichannel programs.
Contribute to a respectful and inclusive team environment and support store operations.
Perform product presentation, cleaning tasks, and adhere to people safety policies.
Create/support an inclusive environment, behave with integrity/honesty, and value guest experience and personal responsibility.
Be aware of how actions may affect others, work productively with others, and bring enthusiasm to work.
Must be legally authorized to work, 18 years or older, and willing to work flexible hours and in a dynamic physical environment.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma, GED, or equivalent
